snippet.title: ASTROSWARM - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Available for Windows, macOS, and Linux on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2664720/ASTROSWARM/
 
Fight for your life against the incoming swarm of zombified astronauts in ASTROSWARM! Use a variety of weapons, turrets, and power-ups to survive!

Build a variety of different turrets to stave on the unrelenting waves of enemies. Protect your module from attackers or face certain death. Defeat enemies to level up and gain game-changing power-ups and weapons. Find synergies that will boost your power drastically. Unlock modifiers that drastically change your play style. Use the ones that fit how you want to play!
